Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing great, 

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policy is due for renewal during 24th Sep 2025, detailed as below:

 

*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 11,379.5/- (Premium BHD 10,345/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

chunks.text:
We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

chunks.text:
if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR & KYC along with the renewal instructions.

 

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further. Should you require any more clarifications please feel free to contact us, contact details as below.

 

Best regards,

 

 

 

Regards,

 

Zahra Bader

Commercial Underwriting Executive – P&C



Headquarters, Bahrain Bay

Unit 51, Bldg. 298, Road 4609, Block 346

P.O. Box 11442, Manama / Sea Front, Kingdom of Bahrain

Tel +973 66328225 

www.gig-gulf.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/303vCmMr4TLx0DzTOh5sRFM8X?domain=gig-gulf.com/>

(م). قبل فتح أي مرفقات، يرجى التحقق منها وفحصها من الفيروسات والعيوب.
